profile.bio: Prospective Green candidate for Balderstone & Kirkholt ward 2015 local elections. Bitcoin donations collected on behalf of the Rochdale Green Party for the general election campaigns in the Rochdale constituency and the Heywood & Middleton constituency. Donations of over Â£50 must come from registered electors.
